io.github.marcuscastelo.quartus.circuit.components

Class CircuitComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.marcuscastelo.quartus.circuit.components.CircuitComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircuitInput, CircuitOutput

    public class CircuitComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe que define genericamente um componente do circuito, utilizado no Mod
